overview:
R. Stephen McCormack is a general partner and co-founder of Commonwealth Capital Ventures.

Before co-founding Commonwealth Capital Ventures, Steve was a senior vice president with 3i Capital where he managed a large portfolio of private equity investments. Prior to 3i, Steve was a partner of Merrill Lynch Venture Capital, the manager of two early stage venture funds. Steve also was a product manager at Interactive Data Corporation and held positions at Massachusetts Technology Development Corporation and the Bank of New York. Steve earned a BA from Dartmouth College and an MBA from The University of Michiganâ€™s Ross School of Business.

Current Investments

* AccuRev
* Carbon Design Systems

Selected Prior Investments

* Altiga Networks (Acquired by Cisco)
* Akibia Group
* Compete (Acquired by TNS)
* e-Dialog (Acquired by GSI Commerce)
* I-Logix (Acquired by Telelogic)
* Net-2-Net (Acquired by Visual Networks)
* Tally Systems (Acquired by Novell)
* Wavesmith Networks (Acquired by Ciena)
* Viewlogic Systems (IPO)
